content:
write_file({'path': 'app/frontend/index.html', 'content': ' Travel Booking App
'})

write_file({'path': 'app/frontend/Dockerfile', 'content': 'FROM node:20-alpine AS build
WORKDIR /app
COPY package.json package-lock.json* ./
RUN npm install --production=false || yarn
COPY . .
RUN npm run build || yarn build

FROM nginx:alpine
COPY --from=build /app/dist /usr/share/nginx/html
EXPOSE 80
CMD ["nginx", "-g", "daemon off;"]
'})

write_file({'path': 'app/frontend/src/components/search/TripTypeToggle.jsx', 'content': 'import React from 'react';
import { Plane, Hotel, Car, Sailboat } from 'lucide-react';
import { Tabs, TabsList, TabsTrigger } from '../ui/Tabs.jsx';

export default function TripTypeToggle({ value, onChange }) {
  return (
    <Tabs value={value} onValueChange={onChange}>
      <TabsList>
        <TabsTrigger value="stays">
          <Hotel className="h-4 w-4" />
          Stays
        </TabsTrigger>
        <TabsTrigger value="flights">
          <Plane className="h-4 w-4" />
          Flights
        </TabsTrigger>
        <TabsTrigger value="cars">
          <Car className="h-4 w-4" />
          Cars
        </TabsTrigger>
        <TabsTrigger value="packages">
          <Sailboat className="h-4 w-4" />
          Packages
        </TabsTrigger>
      </TabsList>
    </Tabs>
  );
}
'})

write_file({'path': 'app/frontend/src/components/results/FlightResultCard.jsx', 'content': 'import React from 'react'; import { Plane, Clock, ArrowRight } from 'lucide-react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Card, { CardBody } from '../ui/Card.jsx'; import Badge from '../ui/Badge.jsx'; export default function FlightResultCard({ flight }) { return (
{flight.from} {flight.to}
{flight.departTime} · {flight.duration} Nonstop {flight.arriveTime}
{flight.badge || 'Great value'} {flight.airline}
from
${flight.price}
per traveler
View details ); } '})

write_file({'path': 'app/frontend/src/components/results/HotelResultCard.jsx', 'content': 'import React from 'react'; import { MapPin } from 'lucide-react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Card from '../ui/Card.jsx'; import Badge from '../ui/Badge.jsx'; export default function HotelResultCard({ hotel }) { return (
{/* Image placeholder */}

{hotel.name}

{hotel.rating.toFixed(1)} / 10
{hotel.reviews} reviews
{hotel.location}
{hotel.badges?.map((b) => ( {b} ))}
{hotel.nights} nights total
Includes taxes & fees
total
${hotel.price}
View details
); } '})

write_file({'path': 'app/frontend/src/pages/Home.jsx', 'content': 'import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Header from '../components/layout/Header.jsx'; import Footer from '../components/layout/Footer.jsx'; import TripTypeToggle from '../components/search/TripTypeToggle.jsx'; import FlightSearchForm from '../components/search/FlightSearchForm.jsx'; import HotelSearchForm from '../components/search/HotelSearchForm.jsx'; import Card, { CardBody } from '../components/ui/Card.jsx'; export default function Home() { const [mode, setMode] = useState('flights'); return (

Unlock more of the world with SkyVoyager

Seamlessly compare flights and stays in one place. Earn rewards on every trip and save with member-only deals.

{mode === 'flights' && } {mode === 'stays' && } {mode !== 'flights' && mode !== 'stays' && (
This demo focuses on Flights and Stays. Choose one of those to start searching.
)}

Members save more

Sign in to unlock instant savings

Access special Member Prices on thousands of flights and stays worldwide.

Plan with confidence

Filter flexible options, see what's included, and book with clear pricing from the start.

); } '})

content: finish({'message': 'Frontend implementation for AeroStay core flows is complete: Home, Flight Search & Detail, Stays Search & Detail, Login, Register, Profile, shared Header/Footer, search forms, result cards, and API/Auth integration with the backend on :8000. Project is set up with Vite, React Router, Tailwind, Radix UI, lucide-react, and Dockerfile.', 'notify': ['user'], 'notify_content': 'Frontend ready at :3001 (Vite dev server). Implemented routes: /, /flights/search, /flights/:id, /stays/search, /stays/:id, /login, /register, /account/profile. Implemented components: Header, Footer, TripTypeToggle, Hero search forms, FlightResultCard, HotelResultCard, Modal, Tabs, etc. Auth context wired to /auth/login, /auth/register, /users/me with JWT in Authorization header. Lists integrate with /flights and /hotels using {items,total,page,pageSize} responses and fall back to demo data if API errors. Please run `npm run dev` in app/frontend and test the main booking discovery flows; report if you want additional UI routes from spec.ui.json (cart, checkout, trips, cars, packages) included in this phase.'})
